original_title: A Infidelidade ao Alcance de Todos
overview: Erotic comedy in two segments: in the first, a candidate running for mayor of a small town pays a visit to the most coveted woman in town, just to show off his manhood. In the other, three couples have fun in a different sort of New Year's eve party, but not according to their plans.
title: A Infidelidade ao Alcance de Todos
